description: This source file implements the construction and removal functions for the BbhmDiagitSink Object, which appears to be related to a Tracert Sink component in a Broadband Home Manager Model. It includes functions to create and destroy the object, initialize its properties and function pointers, and manage its lifecycle.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE BbhmDiagitSinkCreate(ANSC_HANDLE hOwnerContext)
methods.description: Constructs a new BbhmDiagitSink object, allocates memory for it, initializes its properties and function pointers, and returns a handle to the created object.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS BbhmDiagitSinkRemove(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Destroys the given BbhmDiagitSink object, resets its state, and frees its allocated memory.
